I boofed 10mg of the substance, in a bacteriostatic solution. It's a very light brown, instead of white, unlike the PCP and PCPy analogs I have on hand, and the powder is made up of tiny sharded crystals, similar to Ketamine.

I went to continue watching Utopia (2013) with my roommate, while waiting for the onset.

The come-up was very gentle, and hardly noticeable until I tried getting up and walking around. I'm unsure if it had actually kicked in, but had very clearly altered motor control. I feel surprisingly lucid, and not nauseous or mentally altered in any way.

I'm just relaxing in bed and listening to music, which is appreciably enhanced and much more pleasant than normal, as is common with dissos for me. I feel comfortable boofing another 15mg, as I'm not as altered as expected, and still feel very lucid.

I go spend time with my roommate, and notice the room drifting with their curtains forming a tessellating pattern, but the visuals are incredibly mild apart from that, with their monitor and other more complex surfaces remaining unaffected.

I go to lie down with the lights off, to listen to music. I'm quite tired by this point, but my bedtime is normally a few hours later.

I've spent the past few hours talking about Path of Exile and watching YouTube with my roommate, and all-around having a wonderful time. I'm very much enjoying just how lucid and clear-headed I am on DCK, with the main effects remaining focused around physical sedation and relaxation. My regular bodily pain that I normally experience is gone, though I have worse motor control with regards to walking around and talking. I have a few instances with trouble pronouncing words, but nothing terribly major that I can't immediately correct myself on.
I go lay down to sleep, with the DCK seemingly wearing off, though the auditory enhancement and motor control changes are very much present when I walk around to get a glass of water.

I don't have much trouble falling asleep, and when I wake up (around 9 hours later, having slept longer than I normally do), I feel quite refreshed and happy.

All-around, I'm really happy with my experience with this substance, and can now understand why people prefer it relative to other dissos. I have yet to try the 3-MeO-PCE and 3-Me-PCPy I have sitting around, but I anticipate that this one is much more sedating than the two. I'm excited to revisit this substance in the future, probably at a higher dose or combined with a tryptamine, though I could see this dose being very lovely for social settings.
